name: Drift Car - Crashy Skid Racing
description:
This is the most addictive and challenging racing game where your driving skills will be tested to the max. Speed around on this endless journey. Drive as far as you can and set a record.

Game features:

- Different cars to choose.
- Avoid the obstacles.
- High Quality graphics.
- Easy controlls
- Upgrade your car

Download it today for free and challenge your friends to see who can get the high score! How far can you go?
